thread.title: Veteran NBA coach Flip Saunders dies at 60
thread.title_full: Veteran NBA coach Flip Saunders dies at 60

title: Veteran NBA coach Flip Saunders dies at 60
text:
Veteran NBA coach Flip Saunders dies at 60 Saunders was being treated for Hodgkin's lymphoma UPDATED 1:50 PM CDT Oct 25, 2015 Next Maureen O'Hara 2014 More 
Saunders, who also served as the team's president of basketball operations and part owner, was 60. 
The veteran coach was being treated for Hodgkin's lymphoma. On Friday, the team announced that Saunders would sit out the upcoming basketball season.
